About Us:

Koha is a simple and modern donation app that makes giving easier and more rewarding. Users can donate their pre-loved items by dropping them off at our centres or requesting a pickup from their location.Once donations are verified, users earn points that can be redeemed for rewards.

Koha aims to build a more sustainable and responsible community by making the donation process convenient, accessible, and meaningful.
